Title: Access Templates tab
Preconditions: User is logged in to Production Portal; User has access to Configuration Settings
Steps: 1. Go to Configuration Settings. 2. Locate the Templates tab. 3. Click the Templates tab.
Expected Result: Templates tab is displayed; A table listing existing templates is visible; A '+ Create template' button is visible.

Title: Create template - open create flow
Steps: 1. Click '+ Create template'. 2. Observe the page.
Expected Result: User is navigated to the Create template page; Input fields are grouped into sections; Each section has rows with field state toggles (Active/Inactive/Readonly/Mandatory) and an Instruction text field.

Title: Create template - save and notification
Preconditions: User is on Create template page; At least one field is configured
Steps: 1. Configure one or more field states and optionally Instruction. 2. Save the template.
Expected Result: Notification 'Template created' is shown; User is redirected to templates list or template detail.

Title: Template settings persist after save
Preconditions: User has just created a template with known field states and instruction
Steps: 1. Note the configured field states and instruction. 2. Reload the page. 3. Open the same template for editing.
Expected Result: Previously saved field states and instruction are still present.

Title: Edit existing template
Preconditions: At least one template exists; User is on Templates tab
Steps: 1. Open an existing template (e.g. click first row). 2. Change a field state or Instruction. 3. Save.
Expected Result: Template edit page is displayed; After save a success message or notification is shown; Changes are saved (verify after reload).

Title: Section bulk action - Enable all
Preconditions: User is on Create/Edit template page; Section has at least one inactive field
Steps: 1. Open the section burger/three-dots menu. 2. Click 'Enable all'.
Expected Result: All fields in that section are set to Active.

Title: Section bulk action - Disable all
Preconditions: User is on Create/Edit template page; Section has at least one active field
Steps: 1. Open the section burger/three-dots menu. 2. Click 'Disable all'.
Expected Result: All fields in that section are set to Inactive.

Title: Instruction field max length 255
Preconditions: User is on Create/Edit template page
Steps: 1. Enter more than 255 characters in an Instruction field. 2. Attempt to save or observe validation.
Expected Result: Instruction field does not accept or persist more than 255 characters; Validation message or truncation applies.

Title: UI reflects field state
Preconditions: User is on Create/Edit template page
Steps: 1. Toggle a field to Active Inactive Readonly Mandatory. 2. Observe the UI.
Expected Result: UI clearly reflects the current state of each input field (e.g. toggle state labels or styling).

Title: Notification text exact match
Preconditions: User is creating a new template
Steps: 1. Complete and save the template. 2. Read the success notification text.
